title: Cycle to Work
description: Cycle to your workplace for at least 5 days this week

title: Meatless Monday
description: Eat vegetarian meals every Monday this month

title: Energy Saver
description: Reduce home electricity usage for a week

title: Water Warrior
description: Reduce your water usage by 20% this week

title: Green Thumb
description: Plant 2 new trees or plants this week

title: Walk More
description: Walk for at least 30 minutes every day
